nodes.speaker: Leah
nodes.text: Oh! Hello there. I didn't expect visitors this early.

nodes.speaker: Leah
nodes.text: Do you want to help me collect some stones or just chat?

nodes.speaker: Leah
nodes.text: Amazing! I could use the company. Meet me by the stump.

nodes.speaker: Leah
nodes.text: I love watching the light through the trees... sometimes I forget to eat.
